title: Treating acute pain in opioid-dependent patients

title_detail.value: Treating acute pain in opioid-dependent patients

summary: As healthcare providers see more patients with opioid abuse and dependence, they face a difficult challenge: What's the best way to manage acute pain without contributing to the patient's opioid use disorder?

summary_detail.value: As healthcare providers see more patients with opioid abuse and dependence, they face a difficult challenge: What's the best way to manage acute pain without contributing to the patient's opioid use disorder?
